answers.answer: I an in hospital monitoring after having GD cinfirmed yesterday
They put you on a diet and exercise plan to control it and if that doesn't work I believe they give you medicine.

I have GD. I follow a diet, try to exercice after each meal and take insuline. Uncontroled GD can cause baby to gain to much weigth, be born early, have difficulty managing his blood sugar after birth and other rare complications.
I hope this isn't offensive but r u overweight? And props to u for exercising so much.i can maybe do 20 minutes a day!
It happens to anyone regardless of weight. I'm overweight and almost always have been, but I passed my test with the first try.
